news_title: $BTC Airdrop Soon? These Bitcoin-Based Protocols Have Ongoing Crypto Points Farming | BitPinas
news_content: BitPinas Crypto News Philippines BitPinas has already listed different airdrop campaigns on major blockchains like Solana, Ethereum, Sui, The Open Network, and even Ronin—whether these campaigns are hosted by decentralized apps (dApps), games, protocols, and crypto projects. Worth Reading:Here are thefour crypto gamesthat allow players to earn $BTC. Solv Protocol is a Bitcoin staking platform that offers $SolvBTC, a universal Bitcoin Reserve token that unifies fragmented Bitcoin liquidity across different blockchain networks. Lombard is a Bitcoin staking platform that eyes to grow the digital economy by building the infrastructure and distribution channels that unlocks Bitcoin’s utility and transforms the largest decentralized asset from a store of value into a productive financial tool. Bedrock is a multi-token liquid restaking protocol. It is actually an Ethereum-based protocol utilizing EigenLayer but it has a partnership with Bitcoin-focused Babylon in issuing $uniBTC. Airdrop Status:Unconfirmed. Lombard Lux, which are crypto points, are still unclarified on where it will be used. Echo Protocol is a Bitcoin liquidity layer that aims to introduce restaking solutions for $BTC-based assets. PumpBTC is a liquid staking solution for Babylon. It aims to help $BTC holders maximize yields through Babylon’s staking. Airdrop Status:Unconfirmed. The points earned are said to be used for potential rewards in the future, but an airdrop is still not yet confirmed. This article is published on BitPinas:$BTC Airdrop Soon? These Bitcoin-Based Protocols Have Ongoing Crypto Points Farming What else is happening in Crypto Philippines and beyond? Nathaniel studies at University of the Philippines and is Junior Editor at BitPinas.
